problem_statement:
arithmeticOverflow.h:36 signed integer overflow: ... cannot be represented in type '__int128'

**Describe the bug**
```
../base/common/../common/arithmeticOverflow.h:36:17: runtime error: signed integer overflow: 0x1f98e7e04efb298f6a6818a000000000 + 0x698966af4af2770becebbb8000000000 cannot be represented in type '__int128'
```

https://clickhouse-test-reports.s3.yandex.net/19406/9d904e1f820fa99fa7bd30086b9b74e6a053b76b/fuzzer_ubsan/report.html#fail1

